headline: Caterpillar (CAT) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of construction equipment company Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) jumped 2.9% in the afternoon session after the company announced it had entered into an agreement to acquire RPMGlobal Holdings, an Australian-based mining software company.
